channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Announcing the Data Wrangler powered Notebook Results Table】宣布数据Wrangler动力笔记本结果表
item.description: 【If you have ever found yourself rewriting the last line of a notebook cell repeatedly just to get an overview of your data, you're not alone. In VS Code the default output for Pandas DataFrames is a static, truncated HTML table and it often fails to answer essential questions, such as: Do we have rogue blank values somewhere we di】如果您曾经发现自己重写笔记本单元的最后一行只是为了获取数据的概述，那么您并不孤单。在VS代码中，PANDAS DataFrames的默认输出是一个静态的，截断的HTML表，它通常无法回答基本问题，例如：我们在DII的某个地方有Rogue空白值

item.title: 【Bring Your Own Model to Chat in Visual Studio】带上自己的模型在Visual Studio中聊天
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce that you can now bring your own language model into Visual Studio Chat. You can connect API keys from providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google) to access a wider range of models. This makes it ea】我们很高兴地宣布，您现在可以将自己的语言模型带入Visual Studio聊天中。您可以将提供商（OpenAI，Anthropic和Google）的API键连接到更广泛的型号。这使它成为EA

item.title: 【Thoughts on creating a tracking pointer class, part 8: Tracking const objects】关于创建跟踪指针类的想法，第8部分：跟踪const对象
item.description: 【Last time, we added the ability to create non-modifying tracking pointers, but it required that you start with a non-const trackable object. But what if you want to create a non-modifying tracking pointer to an object to which you have only a】上次，我们添加了创建非修改跟踪指针的功能，但是它要求您从非符合跟踪对象开始。但是，如果您想创建一个非修改的跟踪指针，该指针只有一个您只有一个的对象

item.title: 【Azure SDK Release (August 2025)】Azure SDK发布（2025年8月）
item.description: 【Thank you for your interest in the new Azure SDKs! We release new features, improvements, and bug fixes every month. Subscribe to our Azure SDK Blog RSS Feed to get notified when a new release is available. You can find links to packages, code, and docs on our】感谢您对新的Azure SDK的关注！我们每月发布新功能，改进和错误修复。订阅我们的Azure SDK博客RSS feed，以便在有新版本时通知。您可以在我们的包装，代码和文档中找到链接

item.title: 【Ground Truth Curation Process for AI Systems】AI系统的地面真相策划过程
item.description: 【Introduction Imagine you're building a powerful new AI assistant to support real business tasks — like answering maintenance questions in a manufacturing plant or surfacing insights from historical service data. To ensure that this AI system produces accurate and useful responses, we need a reliable way to measure its performance.】简介想象一下，您正在建立一个强大的新AI助手来支持实际的业务任务 - 例如在制造工厂回答维护问题或从历史服务数据中浏览见解。为了确保该AI系统产生准确且有用的响应，我们需要一种可靠的方法来衡量其性能。

item.title: 【Model Context Protocol (MCP) is Now Generally Available in Visual Studio 🎉】模型上下文协议（MCP）现在通常可以在Visual Studio中使用。
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce that MCP support is now GA in Visual Studio—unlocking richer, real-time context from your entire development stack and expanding the power of Agent Mode like never before. Model Context Protocol (MCP) is an open standard that makes it easy for AI agents to connect with external tools and services—think of it】我们很高兴地宣布，MCP支持现在已成为Visual Studio中的GA，从您的整个开发堆栈中解开更丰富，实时的上下文，并以前从未扩展代理模式的力量。模型上下文协议（MCP）是一个开放标准，它使AI代理可以轻松与外部工具和服务联系起来 -

item.title: 【Announcing Copilot Studio Agent Academy: Your Mission Starts Now】宣布Copilot Studio Agent Academy：您的任务现在开始
item.description: 【Welcome to Copilot Studio Agent Academy Whether you're just starting your journey with AI agents or looking to sharpen your skills in Microsoft Copilot Studio, we've got your mission briefing ready and it's time to suit up! We're thrilled to introduce Copilot Studio Agent Academy, a new, self-paced curricu】欢迎来到Copilot Studio Agent Academy，无论您是与AI代理商一起开始旅程，还是希望在Microsoft Copilot Studio中提高您的技能，我们已经准备好您的任务简报了，现在该适应了！我们很高兴介绍副作用工作室代理商学院，这是一款新的，自节奏的课程

item.title: 【Announcing Proxy 4: The Next Leap in C++ Polymorphism】宣布代理4：C ++多态性的下一个飞跃
item.description: 【Proxy 4 is here! After years of innovation and sustained use in the Windows OS codebase (since 2022), Proxy has matured from a bold experiment into a production-grade, modern C++ library for runtime polymorphism. The theory behind Proxy is original, and its design is now proven at scale. We are excited to invite the broader C++ community to jo】代理4在这里！经过多年的创新和在Windows OS代码库中的持续使用（自2022年以来），代理已经从大胆的实验到生产级，现代的C ++库，用于运行时多态性。代理背后的理论是原始的，其设计现在已大规模证明。我们很高兴邀请更广泛的C ++社区前往Jo

item.title: 【Introducing Advanced Shader Delivery】介绍高级着色器交付
item.description: 【This year at gamescom, Microsoft is highlighting new gaming features coming for Windows, particularly for handheld devices. We want to highlight one of the DirectX team’s most exciting new contributions to the PC gaming ecosystem, whic】今年在Gamescom上，微软正在重点介绍Windows的新游戏功能，尤其是用于手持设备。我们想强调DirecTX团队对PC游戏生态系统最令人兴奋的新贡献之一

item.title: 【Copilot Diagnostics toolset for .NET In Visual Studio】Visual Studio中的.NET的Copilot诊断工具集
item.description: 【We know how much energy developers pour into debugging bugs and diagnosing performance in .NET. That’s why we’ve doubled down on making the debugging and profiling experience in Visual Studio not just easier, but genuinely enjoyable meeting you exactly where your real work happens. The same tools you rely on are now able to keep up with yo】我们知道有多少能源开发人员会涌入调试错误和.NET中的性能。这就是为什么我们在视觉工作室中进行调试和分析体验不仅更容易，而且真正令人愉快地与您的真实工作发生的地方真正令人愉快的原因。您依靠的工具现在能够跟上YO
